channel.title: Writings on FerrisEllis.com
channel.description: Recent content in Writings on FerrisEllis.com

item.title: Other Days
item.description: Written by Ferris Ellis on May 27th, 2018. All rights reserved. Some days are the Other Days. The days that aren’t really days, because a day must exist as a whole. On such days, the Other Days, I find myself looking at it. Not throughout the Other Days, as they aren’t really days. In fact it is because of this that they aren’t days. These hour long moments of looking at it, or rather, looking into it.

item.title: Canopy
item.description: Written by Ferris Ellis on May 26th, 2018. All rights reserved. A rainless space among a storm, What you’ll wish for when the sun is too warm, A fact of a forrest, or the few we have left, Beneath it naps are aften slept.
